mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from tgatemst m inner join tgatemst_sidx s on m.fgid = s.fgid
inner join tlocationtree t on s.fgid = t.fgid
where 1=1
and m.fgid like concat(#{fgid}, '%')
and t.fptid like concat(#{ftid}, '%')
and ( m.flname like concat('%', #{flname}, '%') or m.fvname like concat('%', #{fvname}, '%') )

select m.fgid, m.fip, m.flname, m.fversion, m.fvname, m.fuseyn, s.fterminalst, s.fdoorst, s.flockst, s.fcoverst, s.fopenst, s.facnt, s.fucnt,
t.ftid as tid, t.fptid as ptid,
'' as tid, '' as ptid,
(select l.flh from tlocationgate l where l.fgid = m.fgid limit 1) as flh, (select l.fli from tlocationgate l where l.fgid = m.fgid limit 1) as fli, timestampdiff( second, s.fmoddt , now()) as fdf from tgatemst m inner join tgatemst_sidx s on m.fgid = s.fgid
inner join tlocationtree t on s.fgid = t.fgid
where 1=1
and m.fgid like concat(#{fgid}, '%')
and t.fptid like concat(#{ftid}, '%')
and ( m.flname like concat('%', #{flname}, '%') or m.fvname like concat('%', #{fvname}, '%') )
order by m.fgid asc limit #{srchCnt} offset #{offset}

select fsidx, fnm, fmo, ftu, fwe, fth, ffr, fsa, fsu, ff1, ff2, ff3, fdat from tgateshtype
where fsidx = #{fsidx}
mapper.update: update tgateshtype set fmo = #{fmo}, ftu = #{ftu}, fwe = #{fwe}, fth = #{fth}, ffr = #{ffr}, fsa = #{fsa}, fsu = #{fsu}, ff1 = #{ff1}, ff2 = #{ff2}, ff3 = #{ff3} where fsidx = #{fsidx}
mapper.insert: insert into tgateshtype ( fsidx, fnm, fmo, ftu, fwe, fth, ffr, fsa, fsu, ff1, ff2, ff3 ) values ( #{fsidx}, #{fnm}, #{fmo}, #{ftu}, #{fwe}, #{fth}, #{ffr}, #{fsa}, #{fsu}, #{ff1}, #{ff2}, #{ff3} )

insert into ttcmd_main_11 ( fsidx, fgid, frecvdt, fprocid, ftx, fex, fvalue, fprodt, fregdt, fstadt, fmoddt, fackdt, fenddt, fprocd, fprodoc, fqstatus, fsstatus ) values ( #{fsidx}, #{fgid}, now(3), 'MAIN', #{ftx}, #{fex}, #{fvalue}, '', now(3), '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Q' );

insert into ttcmd_main_12 ( fsidx, fgid, frecvdt, fprocid, ftx, fex, fvalue, fprodt, fregdt, fstadt, fmoddt, fackdt, fenddt, fprocd, fprodoc, fqstatus, fsstatus ) values ( #{fsidx}, #{fgid}, now(3), 'MAIN', #{ftx}, #{fex}, #{fvalue}, '', now(3), '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 'Q' );
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(FPW,'1234') AS FPW, FUFLG, FREGDT FROM TZIPPW WHERE FDWNIDX = (SELECT MAX(FDWNIDX) FROM TZIPPW)
mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(FDWNIDX),0)+1 FROM TZIPPW
INSERT INTO TZIPPW (FDWNIDX, FIP, FPW, FREGDT, FUFLG) VALUES ( #{fdwnidx}, #{fip}, #{fpw}, now(3), 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TZIPPW SET FUFLG = 'Y', FMODDT = now(3) WHERE FDWNIDX = #{fdwnidx}
mapper.insert:
select nvl(concat(fpartcd1, lpad(max(right(fgid, 7))+1, 7, '0')), concat(#{fpartcd1}, '0000001')) as fgid from tgatemst where fpartcd1 = #{fpartcd1}
INSERT INTO TGATEMST (FGID, FIP, FLNAME, FPARTCD1, FVNAME) VALUES (#{fgid}, #{fip}, #{flname}, #{fpartcd1}, #{fvname})
INSERT INTO TLOCATIONGATE (FGID, FLH, FLI) VALUES (#{fgid}, #{flh}, #{fli})
INSERT INTO TGATEMST_SIDX (FGID, FMODDT) VALUES (#{fgid}, NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(FGID) FROM TGATEMST WHERE FGID LIKE concat(#{fpartcd1}, '%')
